content:
There are many movies that are known for their great plot twists. Here are some of my recommendations:

1. "Fight Club" (1999) - This movie is a classic example of a twist ending that completely changes the viewer's understanding of the story.

2. "The Usual Suspects" (1995) - This movie features one of the most iconic plot twists in film history, and it has been emulated in many movies since.

3. "The Prestige" (2006) - This movie uses a nonlinear narrative to keep the viewer guessing, and the payoff at the end is worth the wait.

4. "Memento" (2000) - This movie is famous for its unconventional storytelling and unexpected twist ending.

5. "Shutter Island" (2010) - Although the twist ending in this movie has been debated by many, it is still a fascinating and memorable film.

These are just a few examples of movies with great plot twists! There are many others out there, and I'd be happy to recommend more based on your preferences.
